= Components =
(generated)

|| *Component ID* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_AMB HMA.HM.AMB] || Ambiguus Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Control muscles of pharynx || On par with VGM, speech ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_HYG HMA.HM.HYG] || Hypoglossal Motor Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Control of tongue ||  ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_INM HMA.HM.INM] || Intercalated Nucleus of Medulla || Premotor Nucleus || Coordinate tongue movements, vestibuloocular reflex || Receives sensory inputs from neck region ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_SOL HMA.HM.SOL] || Solitary Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Carry taste buds, thoracic and abdominal viscera || c.n. VII, IX, X ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_PA5 HMA.HM.TGM.PA5] || Paratrigeminal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Orofacial nociceptive sensory processing || Somatosensory reflex, site for nociceptive inputs<BR>from sciatic innervation field ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_PE5 HMA.HM.TGM.PE5] || Peritrigeminal Nucleus || Sensory Relay Nucleus || Thermoregulation || Project to thermosensitive neurons of medial<BR>preoptic area ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HM_TGM_STR HMA.HM.TGM.STR] || Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Discriminative sensation and light touch of face, conscious proprioception || Pontine Nuclei, part of cranial nerve nuclei, ear ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_FCM HMA.HP.FCM] || Facial Motor Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Control of face || Pons ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PN_KFN HMA.HP.PN.KFN] || Kolliker-Fuse Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Control of protruder tongue muscles contraction to maintain respiration || To hypoglossal nucleus and phrenic nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PN_SC HMA.HP.PN.SC] || Nucleus Subceruleus || Premotor Nucleus || Tongue control || To hypoglossal nucleus ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_CRF HMA.HP.PRF.CRF] || Caudal Pontine Reticular Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Mediate head movements || Grinding of the teeth in sleep, projections from<BR>superior colliculus, to spinal cord, extends to<BR>facial ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_GCR HMA.HP.PRF.GCR] || Gigantocellular Reticular Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Mediate head movements || Projects to hypoglossal nucleus, abducens ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_PDT HMA.HP.PRF.PDT] || Pontine Reticulotegmental Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Mediate saccadic eye movements || Inactivation leads to deficit of expression, but<BR>not learning ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PRF_RPO HMA.HP.PRF.RPO] || Oral Pontine Reticular Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Mediation of changing to and from REM sleep || Part of horizontal gaze center, projects to spinal<BR>cord and abducens ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_PTR HMA.HP.PTP.PTR] || Principal Trigeminal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Facial Somatic Sensations || Upper, maxillary, ophthalmic ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_HP_PTP_TRM HMA.HP.PTP.TRM] || Trigeminal Motor Nucleus || 1-order Motor Nucleus || Muscles of first branchial arch || Pontine Nuclei, lower face and jaw control, Motor<BR>Nucleus of V n. ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_MM_CJ HMA.MM.CJ] || Cajal Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Integration of head and eye movements || Projects to CN3, CN4 nuclei, rotation of body about<BR>its long axis ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_MM_INMLF HMA.MM.INMLF] || Interstitial Nucleus of Medial Longitudinal Fasciculus || Motor Relay Nucleus || Controls vertical gaze || Project to vestibular nuclei ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_MM_MSTR HMA.MM.MSTR] || Mesencephalic Trigeminal Nucleus || 1-order Sensory Nucleus || Facial Somatic Sensations || Lower, mandibular - ganglion ||
|| [BrainRegionHMA_SC_VH_ISL HMA.SC.VH.ISL] || Spinal Accessory Nucleus || Premotor Nucleus || Control of neck || Rotate head, continuus from AMB ||
